name: Easy QR Code Generator
author: Byvex Team

sections.description:
Generate custom and automatic site page URL QR codes.

Try Our Live Shortcode Generator

sections.installation:
Installing from WordPress repository:

  1. From the dashboard of your site, navigate to Plugins –> Add New.
  2. In the Search type Easy QR Code Generator
  3. Click Install Now
  4. When it’s finished, activate the plugin via the prompt. A message will show confirming activation was successful.

Make sure that your server has php version greater or equal to 7.0, otherwise, the plugin won’t activate.
sections.faq:
Where can I report bugs?

Report bugs on the Easy QR Code Generator GitHub repository.
